/============================================= = = = Global Variables = = = = Contains all color definitions and basic = = variables that affect the entire website = ===============================================/

/* Color Palette */ \(indigo-dye: #0A2A5E;\)royal-blue: #1E50A0; \(lapis-lazuli: #3c6997ff;\)vivid-sky-blue: #5adbffff;

/– scss:defaults –/ \(body-bg: #fafbfc;\)body-color: #2d3748;
\(link-color: #0A2A5E;\)font-family-sans-serif: “Source Sans Pro”, -apple-system, “system-ui”, “Segoe UI”, Roboto, “Helvetica Neue”, Arial, sans-serif; $font-size-root: 16px;

/– scss:rules –/

:root { –primary-color: #{\(indigo-dye}; --secondary-color: #{\)royal-blue};
–background-main: white;
–background-alt: #{\(body-bg}; --accent-1: #{\)body-color};
–accent-2: #{$lapis-lazuli};
}

body { font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; color: var(–accent-1); letter-spacing: 0.01em; font-family: $font-family-sans-serif; background: linear-gradient(-45deg, #0A2A5E, #1E50A0, #3c6997ff, #0A2A5E) !important; background-size: 400% 400% !important; animation: gradientShift 15s ease infinite !important; min-height: 100vh; position: relative; }

body::after { content: ’‘; position: fixed; bottom: 15%; right: 10%; width: 100px; height: 75px; background-image: url(’logo.unfinished_nowhite- Copy.png’); background-size: contain; background-repeat: no-repeat; opacity: 0.12; filter: brightness(0) invert(1); animation: float 8s ease-in-out infinite reverse; z-index: 0; }
